qcv1

Class MRegister

  • java.lang.Object
    • qcv1.MRegister
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    QRegister

    public class MRegister
extends java.lang.Object
implements QRegister
    The quantum register with the amplitudes of its basis states (i.e. state vector) stored in a matrix representation.
    Author:
    Michael Chiang

    • Constructor Summary

      Create a register with a specified number of qubits.

      • MRegister

        public MRegister(int num,
         java.lang.String type)
        Create a register with a specified number of qubits
        Parameters:
        num - Number of qubits
        type - Type of matrix (e.g. complex (dense), sparse, sparse gate)

      • MRegister

        public MRegister(int num,
         int n,
         java.lang.String type)
        Create a register with a specified number of qubits. The amplitude of the nth state is set to one and others are set to zero.
        Parameters:
        num -
        n -
        type -
